about_the_game:
Explore the animal world in this fun, family-friendly game for kids and adults. Sit back and relax and exercise your memory by finding all animal pairs.

Every stage contains many pairs, each with a different pattern or pose. Your objective is to match all pairs in each stage to win.

HAND-DRAWN ART

Play across seven stages all with hand-drawn art. Each stage features a different animal, from beautiful carp to wild giraffes and some of the most famous house pets. Unleash each stage's colors, and earn achievements.

YOU ARE IN CONTROL

The game has full controller support. Play and have fun from the comfort of your couch. Do you like playing at your desk? Use your keyboard and mouse to play with simple intuitive controls.

Playing at night? Change the background color to a different one.

WANT A BIT MORE?

If you feel like playing again, randomize the positions of the animals to an extra challenge, or activate the stop-watch mode and see how fast you beat each level.

name: Animal Pattern

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel Core i5 6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Vulkan 1.0 compatible hardware
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Explore the animal world in this fun, family-friendly game. Sit back and relax and exercise your memory by finding all animal pairs. Match all pairs to win across seven stages with all hand-drawn art featuring many unique animals.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
